name: LA Designs
tagline: We create strong brands and websites.
description:
We help small and large businesses achieve a strong online and offline presence through web design and branding.
Our business is all about getting to the bottom what will make a business profitable and how we can help stimulate strong lead, sales and inquiry generation.
We aren't the cheapest, we believe in what we do and we know we can help clients achieve great things and grow their business exponentially.
